scripts.lint: cd cli && npm run lint && cd ../options-reader && npm run lint && cd ../core && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd cli && npm run test && cd ../options-reader && npm run test && cd ../core && npm run test
scripts.compile: cd cli && npm run compile && cd ../options-reader && npm run compile && cd ../core && npm run compile
scripts.install: cd cli && npm install && cd ../options-reader && npm install && cd ../core && npm install
scripts.link: cd cli && npm link typeorm-core && cd ../options-reader && npm link typeorm-core
